subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Wrestling
lead_paragraph: Buvaisar Saitiev, one of only three wrestlers to have won three Olympic gold medals, has abandoned his plans to make a comeback and attempt to win a record fourth at the London Games this summer.
snippet: Buvaisar Saitiev, one of only three wrestlers to have won three Olympic gold medals, has abandoned his plans to make a comeback and attempt to win a record fourth at the London Games this summer.
